title: Love v. Truth: the Intersection of Iris Murdoch and Jordan Peterson on the Concept of the Good
description:
Matthew Dean Allison and Karen discuss Jordan Peterson's idea that truth is nested inside love and the connection with Iris Murdoch's lecture on the Sovereignty of Good, chapter two.

https://www.amazon.com/Sovereignty-Good-Iris-Murdoch/dp/0415253993/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1AMHYMKRC1017&dchild=1&keywords=iris+murdoch+sovereignty+of+the+good&qid=1596487973&s=books&sprefix=Iris+Murdoch%2Cstripbooks%2C201&sr=1-1

I apologize for the video quality. That happened post-production. Here's a link to the Peterson video on Truth and Love (I showed the clip from 5:15 to 6:20) https://youtu.be/VkysJjiOQYk

Matt's YouTube channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCon-YE6Xu33z3xihmF_WRrQ

Karen's YouTube channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgp_r6WlBwDSJrP43Mz07GQ

Karen's Website:  https://karenwongart.com
https://TheMeaningCode.com
